thread.title: Miley Cyrus & Liam Hemsworth Having Babies??? See The GROWING Evidence!
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus & Liam Hemsworth Having Babies??? See The GROWING Evidence!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Miley Cyrus & Liam Hemsworth Having Babies??? See The GROWING Evidence!

organizations.name: miley cyrus & liam hemsworth having babies

text:
The evidence is expanding... And no, we don't mean baby bumps!
Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth may or may not have gotten married in secret , but it's beginning to look like they're taking that next step either way.
Here's what has fans speculating Miley is ready to pop out a little Aussie demigod: The couple have adjoining properties, a combined 10 acres in Malibu with two houses, a music studio, a swimming pool, even a barn.
Photos: Miley & Liam's Roller Coaster Romance â€” A Timeline! 
But it appears based on DailyMail.com 's new pics of the property that the couple have contractors adding on a little something -- what looks like a playground and a nursery!
Now obviously this is no proof the couple are already expecting. And the giant toy dinosaurs could just be for when The Flaming Lips come over . Ha!
But we have to admit it's a fair indicator they may be planning on kids in the very near future.
What do YOU think, Perezcious readers??
[ Image via Daniel Tanner/ WENN . ]
